response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exceptional piece is not just an item but a symbol of prestige and exclusivity. I believe it could be a perfect fit for your collection or needs, and I am confident it will bring you immense satisfaction. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 750000}
